thread.title: Woman who 'exaggerated' injuries gets €95k payout for taxi collision
thread.title_full: Woman who 'exaggerated' injuries gets €95k payout for taxi collision

title: Woman who 'exaggerated' injuries gets €95k payout for taxi collision
text: Woman who 'exaggerated' injuries gets €95k payout for taxi collision Independent.ie A woman, who a judge said had exaggerated symptoms of chronic pain caused by hitting her head on the headrest of a taxi as it collided with a fence while reversing, has been awarded €95,000. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/courts/woman-who-exaggerated-injuries-gets-95k-payout-for-taxi-collision-35461869.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35216167.ece/27db2/AUTOCROP/h342/PL25822991The%20Taxi%20Drivers.jpg Mr Justice Raymond Fullam was satisfied the woman had exaggerated her symptoms and their connection with the accident. Stock picture (Stock picture) A woman, who a judge said had exaggerated symptoms of chronic pain caused by hitting her head on the headrest of a taxi as it collided with a fence while reversing, has been awarded €95,000. Share Woman who 'exaggerated' injuries gets €95k payout for taxi collision Independent.ie A woman, who a judge said had exaggerated symptoms of chronic pain caused by hitting her head on the headrest of a taxi as it collided with a fence while reversing, has been awarded €95,000. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/courts/woman-who-exaggerated-injuries-gets-95k-payout-for-taxi-collision-35461869.html
